item.title: Miracle Garden blossoms in Dubai
item.description:
20190418-Miracle Garden blossoms in Dubai
下载此壁纸（1920x1080）

Since its opening in 2013, the Miracle Garden in Dubai has been setting records at a breakneck speed. At 780K square feet the sheer size of this attraction makes it the world largest flower garden. With the addition of the Airbus A380 that appears in today's image, the garden added world's largest floral installation to its achievements in 2016. Most recently, an 18-meter tall Mickey Mouse helped them nab the tallest topiary sculpture record.
